attributes.action: Preserve the coastline of Anglesey - terminate the Morlais tidal energy project
attributes.background:
The Morlais project manages a 35 km2 site near Holy Island, Anglesey and has the potential to become one of the largest tidal energy sites in the world. 

The project should be terminated before it destroys one of the most stunning, natural and popular coastal areas in North Wales.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the Morlais tide energy project needs the consent of the Welsh Government to proceed, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find more about the process here:

http://www.morlaisenergy.com/consenting/

You could start a petition to the Welsh Assembly here:

http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
